snippet.title: CANCEL CULTURE TAG | FT JOHNNY DEPP, AMBER HEARD | BULLYING IN THE BOOKTUBE COMMUNITY | Video 24
snippet.description:
This is video 24 of my August Challenge of releasing a video a day. What do you think about cancel culture? These are my opinions. I use Jonny Deep and Amber Heard as a case study. I also use a personal experience and an example of an evil person trying to take advantage of the booktube community. 

let me know what you think? 

The original tag is from: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gTqtnMSPqhI&t=0s&ab_channel=Gunpowder%2CFiction%26Plot

I was tagged by Larry Has Opinions Check out his channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UQveE9eyB9c&t=329s&ab_channel=LarryHasOpinions

I tag TornadoCreator: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/TornadoCreator

Tag prompts:
1. Tag people. To generate interesting conversation try to tag at least one channel who you think might have a different (either opposing or more radical) opinion to you and one who might have a similar one.
2. What is cancel/call out culture?
3. Is Cancel/Callout culture a positive or a negative force in the booktube/bookstagram/bookish community as a whole? Why do you think this? 
4. From mixing fabrics to involuntary cannibalism; what transgressions would you boycott an author over? 
5. What does boycott mean to you? Not buy, not read, not promote – all three? How do you boycott – does this depend on the transgression/offence?
6. What books or authors (if any) that you would have otherwise read, do you boycott?
7. When does boycotting a book or author become cancel culture? Are the two even related?
8. How do you think power, money, size of audience, influence etc effect who is cancelling and being cancelled? e.g can a small BookTuber cancel a best selling author, what about a large BookTuber and a tiny author.
9. Do you apply the same standards to the Booktubers you watch? Have you ever called out, confronted, privately messaged or unsubscribed from somebody over their opinion?
10. If cancel culture is a destructive force; a constructive force might be to highlight talented authors and excellent books from communities “victimised” by anybody you boycott. Please highlight some authors and recommend us some books

#lEpicTalez #booktube #cancelculture #cancelculturetag #booktubetag #booktubers #JusticeForJohnny 

All my Social Media can be found here:
https://linktr.ee/EpicTalez

Cradle Of Chaos | WattPad Book:
https://www.wattpad.com/story/266770789-cradle-of-chaos

Discord: 
https://discord.gg/gxuz9b4sTy 

Instagram: 
https://www.instagram.com/epic_talez/

TikTok:
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMdkJTJnT/

#booktube #gunpowderfictionplot #booktubecommunity #booktubetag
#booktubeculture
